attributes.action: PAYBACK FOR MPs  who have abused expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs who have been found to have abused their expenses should be made to carry out a period of community service not less than 100 hours. They should be made to wear the bright yellow jacket with PAYBACK in large letters. How is the trust in the so called lawmakers going to be restored if they appear to be immune from the law.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
